name: Phortress
description:
Controls:

WASD or ARROWS to move camera

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to place stuff

MIDDLE MOUSE  BUTTON set follow cam to a block

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON delete stuff

SCROLL to zoom in and out

K to reset camera position

Gameplay:

Currently there are 6 materials: wood, rope, rocc, ballon, throwing rocc and T R E E.

You can hold left mouse button while placing to make the piece longer or charge a throw.

The only way to control stuff right now is by throwing a rocc at it.

Experiment with each  material and see what you can come up with. If you're ever bored (which lets be honest will never happen), try getting the blu ball to either world ends(left side is harder btw).
